content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[CloudStreaming_Customers]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[CloudStreaming_Customers]
( 
	[CustomerID] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[LastName] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[FirstName] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[PhoneNumber] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[CreatedDate] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[UpdatedDate] [varchar](500)  NULL
)
WITH (DATA_SOURCE = [AzureDataLakeStore], LOCATION = N'/Raw/CloudStreaming_Raw/dboCustomers', FILE_FORMAT = [csv_delimitedNew], REJECT_TYPE = VALUE, REJECT_VALUE = 0 )
GO
